meta.name: roll
meta.description: Roll a dice! Although the randomness generated is seeded by the time (Assuming the bot is running in nodejs), therefore allowing anyone to get any value, the randomness is achieved in the delay for your message to be interpreted.

examples.description: Returns a random value from each die from 1-6, and displays the total for the dice.
Returns a random value from each dice from 1 to the number of sides selected.
Returns a random value from each die from 1 to the number of sides selected, and displays the total for the dice.
